EN._eSavingMode_FULL: FULL : copy all files and overwrite the same files
EN._eSavingMode_DIFF: DIFF : copy only files who aren't present in destination folder
EN._welcome: welcome on a ProSoft Software : EasySave
EN._addTemplate:
ADD <JOB-NAME> 
 add a job with the given name 
 name are unique only one can be declare 
 empty name, "ALL" and "?" are not allow
EN._removeTemplate:
REMOVE <JOB-NAME> 
 remove the job declared with the specified name
EN._renameTemplate:
RENAME <JOB-NAME> 
 rename the editing job with the given name 
 name are unique only one can be declare 
 empty name, "ALL" and "?" are not allow
EN._editTemplate:
EDIT <JOB-NAME> 
 set the job in edition mode
EN._setRepSrcTemplate:
SET_REP_SRC <PATH-FOLDER> 
 set the folder's path wich conatains the content to save  
 the path must exist or it will be not set
EN._getRepSrcTemplate:
GET_REP_SRC 
 show the source folder's path contained in the editing job
EN._setRepDestTemplate:
SET_REP_DEST <PATH-FOLDER> 
 set the folder's path to define where to save the content of source folder 
 the path must exist or it will be not set
EN._getRepDestTemplate:
GET_REP_DEST 
 show the source folder's path contained in the editing job
EN._setRepSavingModeTemplate:
SET_SAVING_MODE <SAVING MODE> 
 set the mode of saving
EN._getRepSavingModeTemplate:
GET_SAVING_MODE 
 show the mode of saving
EN._commandUnknow: command unknowns, please check the writting
EN._runTemplate:
RUN <JOB-NAME> 
 execute the job define 
 you can execute all job with the paramter "ALL"
EN._changeLangTemplate:
CHANGE_LANG <LANG-CODE> 
 change the language of the application
EN._errorParameterWrongType: type of the parameter not correct
EN._errorMaxJob: the number limit to declare job has been reached
EN._errorFolderDontExist: the folder's path given doesn't exist
EN._errorNameNotAllowed: the name given is not allow, please something else
